title: Alice-san to Masayoshi-kun wa Mukankei desu ka?
original_name: ありすさんと正義くんは無関係ですか?
sinopse: Suzuki is a boy who is feared for his appearance and various rumors, sadly keeping him from having any close friends. It was the first time he had ever made a girl cry, even though he had helped her on the train. But for some reason that girl, Azekura, Alice uses it as a turning point and begins to learn about Suzuki's differences.
